description.plain:
Kevin Jerome Gilyard aka Kevin Gates was born February 5, 1986, in New Orleans, Louisiana but grew up in Baton Rouge. He began his career in 2006 as an artist on Dead Game Records.

Following a short stint in prison, in 2011, Kevin created BWA (Bread Winner’s Association), which is partnered with Atlantic Records. He lives with his wife, Dreka Gates, and now his two children Khaza and Islah, which he named his hit album of 2016.

body.plain:
Kevin Jerome Gilyard aka Kevin Gates was born February 5, 1986, in New Orleans, Louisiana but grew up in Baton Rouge. He began his career in 2006 as an artist on Dead Game Records.

Following a short stint in prison, in 2011, Kevin created BWA (Bread Winner’s Association), which is partnered with Atlantic Records. He lives with his wife, Dreka Gates, and now his two children Khaza and Islah, which he named his hit album of 2016.

songs.title: 2 Phones

description.plain:
Kevin Gates is a busy man so he needs two phones—to keep his drug work separate from his personal life.

“2 Phones” was released on November 5, 2015, serving as the fifth single from Gates' debut studio album Islah. It made it to number 17 on the US Billboard 100, the first time Gates had ever cracked the top 20, and, as of October 2016, his highest charting track. It also made into the Canadian top 100. It’s since been certified double platinum, with 2 million+ sales in the US alone.

The song’s accompanying music video premiered on January 1, 2016 on Kevin’s YouTube account. It was directed by Jon J, who previously directed the music videos for Gates' “Kno One” and “Really Really.”

songs.embed_content: Read “2 Phones” by Kevin Gates on Genius

songs.title: Really Really

description.plain:
Kevin Gates tells us how he’s really ‘bout that life. For those doubting and hating on him, Gates instinctively responds with one answer: “really really.”

“Really Really” is the fourth single from Gates' debut album, Islah. An official video was released in December 2015, and has amassed 175 million views as of December 2017.

songs.embed_content: Read “Really Really” by Kevin Gates on Genius

It's refreshing to find someone who think like me so I can't be wrong

When his seatbelt strap make it hard to lean back
Sittin' up straight in the car with the shades on

Now I'm waiting on a nigga for the get out of line
No drive by we jump out and dump where you grind
Excuse me I meant to say where you spend time
You too scared to hustle you just wasting time
I used to spend nights with Khalil and Jaquincy
And his brother fucked with the ones who against me
Stop making threats cause I swear I hate livin'
You say you don't like me well shut up or kill me
Well shut up or kill me
You say you don't like me well shut up or kill me
Bitch shut up or kill me

It's refreshing to find someone who thinks like me so I can't be wrong
I'm a perfect imperfection and I don't find interest in the radio
